channel.title: Scar doesn't do what I tell it to do?

item.title: Scar doesn't do what I tell it to do?
item.dc:creator: @dragx55 dragx55
item.description:
@dragx55 wrote:

[code]program autopestcontrol;

var
turkey, option, x, y: integer;

procedure login;
begin
If (FindBitmap(turkey, x, y))then
ClickMouse(311, 373, True)
end;

procedure autopc;
begin
If (FindColorTolerance(x, y, 3890812, 281, 220, 327, 270, 2))then
ClickMouse(x, y, True)
Wait(100)
end;

procedure checksumc;
begin
If (FindColorTolerance(x, y, 5855344, 369, 274, 435, 238, 1))then
Wait(100)
ClickMouse(167, 208, True);
Wait(100)
ClickMouse(199, 208, True);
Wait(100)
ClickMouse(233, 208, True);
Wait(100)
ClickMouse(264, 208, True);
Wait(100)
ClickMouse(296, 208, True);
Wait(100)
ClickMouse(328, 208, True);
Wait(100)
ClickMouse(397, 208, True)//prayer
Wait(100)
ClickMouse(169, 242, True)
Wait(100)
ClickMouse(199, 242, True)
Wait(100)
ClickMouse(231, 242, True)
Wait(100)
ClickMouse(265, 242, True)
Wait(100)
ClickMouse(296, 242, True)
Wait(100)
ClickMouse(327, 242, True)
Wait(100)
ClickMouse(361, 242, True)
Wait(100)
ClickMouse(199, 242, True)//farming
Wait(100)
ClickMouse(167, 277, True)
Wait(100)
ClickMouse(200, 277, True)
Wait(100)
ClickMouse(232, 277, True)
Wait(100)
ClickMouse(262, 277, True)
Wait(100)
ClickMouse(293, 277, True)
Wait(100)
ClickMouse(327, 277, True)
Wait(100)
ClickMouse(360, 277, True)
Wait(100)
end;

begin
repeat
turkey := (couldnt put this because itâ€™s too many characters)

login;
autopc;
checksumc;
until(false)
end.[/code]

The script does procedure checksumc even though I know scar did not detect the color 5855344.

Read full topic
